EXTRA_TEXT: #yAtlas has no #yEnergy. #yEnergy gains or losses will respectively create or #yDevour cards in the #yExhaust #yPile, such as #yFood cards that begin combat #yExhausted. #yDevouring when you don't have enough cards will cause you to gain #rRavenous equal to what you couldn't pay.

#rRavenous will cause you to #rlose #rHP at the start of the turn equal to its amount, then attempt to reduce itself by #yDevouring up to that many cards in the #yExhaust #yPile. Other types of #yDevouring won't reduce the amount of #rRavenous you have.

#yX-Cost Cards have a #yCap on #bX shown on each card. You'll play those cards for #yexactly the amount shown #yevery time. NL NL #yRelics that normally increase #bMaximum #bEnergy will increase the cap for #yX-Cost cards by the same amount.

#yRisk is the #rhard #rcap on the number of cards beyond your #yStarting #yHand that can be drawn each turn, and is displayed where the #yEnergy #yOrb would be. NL NL While #yRisk is maxed, you become unable to draw cards. It #yresets at the end of each turn.
